A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie but... I'd have edited it better. All respect for Carrie Fischer but there could have been a better plan for Leia. The good-the acting was the best of all the episodes. Luke was awesome...could have got there sooner though. The trippy Rey sequence rocked! Snokes soldiers were a little Bill n Ted's ridiculousness. Fin and Rose - eh. Laura Dern's character\, not so much either. But Rey and Kilo ---- yes!!! Totally awesome! Can't stop thinking about the possibilities! Come on!
